Title: Secondhand Lions
Actors: Michael Caine, Robert Duvall, Haley Joel Osment, Kyra Sedgwick
Plot: A boy named Walter is dropped by his mother Mae at his great-uncles' house. Later,Walter will find out his great-uncles' big secret. And rumors say that Hub & Garth, Walter's great uncles, have stolen much gold & money. (some say they stole it from Al Capone) Did they really steal that money or not?
Production: Avery Pix, Digital Domain, David Kirschner Productions
